title: Nikki Lipstick: Keep Smiling, Even If You're Missing a Tooth
itunes:title: Nikki Lipstick: Keep Smiling, Even If You're Missing a Tooth
description:
In Part 2, Nikki talks with Bunnie about fighting the war against fast fashion, and embracing the light even during dark times. She also talks about the pink Starbucks drink that turned her life around, overcoming some scary health challenges, and what's new in 2021 for her fashion and make up line. 

Bunnie: www.dumbblondeunrated.com

Nikki: Website | Facebook | Twitter | Instagram 

  • "I know in my heart, we are going to win in the court of love." - Nikki 
  • "You never realize how strong you are until you have to be." - Bunnie
